exhibitors.INFO:
Visit Hashtag 64 and get a Limited-Edition 1st Copy of the long-awaited ARDEVUR: The Game of Resources at its exclusive SPIEL premiere! Be the first to own and play it before its worldwide release!

ABOUT THE PUBLISHER

Hashtag 64 (or #64) is an independent publishing house and development studio for board games, books, and other entertainment media, with an extensive and unconventional long-term vision!

#64 takes the concepts, theories, and philosophy of CEO and Founder Gabriele Areolite and transmutes them into tangible products designed to educate and entertain.

Prior to 2024, the founder dedicated most of his time and efforts developing the business his main company ARDEVUR Commodities, a multinational mining enterprise specialising in the global import/export of metal and mineral commodities.

Drawing on the CEO‚Äôs decade long experience in the mining industry, Hashtag 64‚Äôs inaugural project ‚Äì ARDEVUR: The Game of Resources simulates the realistic dynamics of the mining industry and supply chain, while introducing what's beneath the surface: a clash forTotal Control.

In addition to bringing educational value to the board game scene, Hashtag 64 is working on the launch of its own IP, an entire franchise of games and books that delve into hot topics such as the implications of technological advancement on the global order, and the future of humanity.

With a clear and structured roadmap of future releases, #64 is ready to entertain you for the years to come!

PARTNERSHIP OPPORTUNITIES

Get in touch for üåç Worldwide Distribution | üí∞ Investment & Licensing | üé¨ Collaborations

exhibitors.INFO:
Albi is a board game publisher and distributor from the Czech Republic, where we‚Äôve been part of the gaming community since 1991. We‚Äôve grown over the years, with teams now in Slovakia and Poland, but at our core, we‚Äôre still all about sharing the joy of games, books, and gifts with people who love them as much as we do.

One of the games we‚Äôre especially proud of is Karak. Seeing it find its way to over 450,000 players around the world has been an amazing journey, and it‚Äôs all thanks to the players who took a chance on it.

Today, we‚Äôre lucky to have over 500 teammates and more than 40 stores across the Czech Republic and Slovakia. In 2023, we reached a turnover of 76 million euros‚Äîa milestone we never imagined back in the early days. But we know none of this would be possible without your incredible support.

We‚Äôre here because we love what we do and because people like you keep the passion alive. Thank you for being part of our story‚Äîand here‚Äôs to many more games to come!
exhibitors.NAME: ALBI

exhibitors.INFO:
How it all began

AMIGO saw the light of day in 1980. Thanks to successful distribution rights (such as for the card game UNO), the publisher became a fixture in the card game sector and eventually established itself in the board game sector as well.

After several nominations, AMIGO received the Game of the Year award for the first time in 1998 for the family game Elfenland. In 2017, ICECOOL received the Children's Game of the Year award, the card game LAMA was nominated for Game of the Year in 2019, and in 2022, Zauberberg, another children's game, received the coveted award.

Always daring to try something new

In addition to its own board games, AMIGO expanded its licensing and distribution activities in the 1990s and introduced the first trading card game to the German and Austrian markets in 1995 with Magic: The Gathering. Since 1999, AMIGO has also been the exclusive distributor of the Pok√©mon trading card game.

AMIGO with an eye to the future

With classics such as Halli Galli, 6 nimmt! and Wizard, AMIGO has not only become synonymous with high-quality card games, but also stands for simplicity. Whether it's easy rules, simple communication channels, or uncomplicated service, AMIGO will continue to build on these strengths in the future in order to adapt to the fast-paced market and continue to live up to its philosophy of ‚Äúsimply good games.‚Äù

AMIGO international

The world is becoming increasingly interconnected, and with it the global market for board games. In addition to export partners in almost 50 countries, AMIGO launched its own company, AMIGO Games Inc., in the USA in 2018. AMIGO is continuously working to introduce foreign countries to the world of board and card games through entertaining games with simple rules.
exhibitors.NAME: AMIGO

exhibitors.INFO: Acheron is Italy‚Äôs leading producer of original role-playing games, specialized also in Italian fantasy and horror novels. Our offices are located in Milan and New York. Acheron was founded in 2015 as a publisher of speculative fiction books (Acheron Books) to which the role-playing game division (Acheron Games) was later added in 2018. Our most famous games are Brancalonia - Spaghetti Fantasy RPG, who has won numerous awards, Lex Arcana, who has 30 years of history, Inferno - Dante‚Äôs Guide to Hell, Apocalisse - Guide to the Armageddon, and Helluva Town, a cartoon vintage RPG. exhibitors.INFO:
Step into the Across the Realms booth for an exclusive preview of Space Breachers, our upcoming miniature-heavy board game inspired by the classic Space Crusade by Games Workshop and Milton Bradley.

Space Breachers is a thrilling cooperative board game for 1‚Äì5 players, where you command a squad of elite soldiers infiltrating a massive enemy spaceship. Battle swarms of monstrous foes through a maze of corridors as you race to complete critical mission objectives.

The game unfolds on a dynamic, procedurally generated board that represents the ever-shifting layout of the spaceship. Enemies emerge in waves of mysterious ‚Äúblips,‚Äù revealed only when a Breacher makes contact. A blip could be anything from a crazed, lowly sailor to a terrifyingly powerful Hellnaught‚Äîkeep your rifle loaded and your wits sharp when you breach that next door!
exhibitors.NAME: Across the Realms

exhibitors.INFO: Aegir Games is a board game publisher that specializes in developing and licensing historical strategy games. Europa Universalis: The Price of Power is a 4X historical game, set from 1444 to 1812 with more than 300 historical Events in the most sandbox form possible. exhibitors.INFO:
Age of the Moon is an innovative strategy board game that places players at the heart of the race to build the first fully operational lunar base. Born from an international educational project, the game combines competition, diplomacy, and resource management in the realistic setting of the Moon‚Äôs South Pole.

Gameplay combines cooperation and negotiation, mission planning, infrastructure management, and high-stakes decision-making under the pressure of dynamic lunar events. The game has been play-tested and endorsed by leading space organizations, including SGAC, the European Space Foundation, the International Space University, and experts from ESA and NASA. It was successfully funded on Kickstarter in November 2024.

At our booth, you‚Äôll be able to:

  • try the game,

  • learn about the creative process behind it,

  • purchase your own copy, and

  • explore themed lunar merchandise ‚Äì including t-shirts, tote bags, and other products featuring space-inspired designs.

Join the lunar revolution ‚Äì plan your mission and build the base of the future!
exhibitors.NAME: Age of the Moon

We are successful at crowdfunding, including huge campaigns for Thunderstone Quest, Edge of Darkness, Dead Reckoning, Let‚Äôs Go to Japan, and Undergrove..

We are especially proud of our relationship with Flatout Games, who created Point Salad and Point Galaxy, Propolis, Knitting Circle, Calico, Cascadia, and Cascadia Junior which AEG publishes or co-publishes with Flatout.

AEG‚Äôs International Business Division works with partners around the world to create localized versions of our games, and with other publishers to deliver localized versions of their games as well (titles include Arborea from Alley Cat Games, Trailblazers and Zoo Vadis from Bitewing Games, Pirates of the High Teas from Pink Hawk Games and Diatoms from Ludoliminal).

AEG is based in the United States and has a virtual workforce distributed all over the world. AEG staff work from Greece, Canada, the United Kingdom, and several US States.

Our company is firmly committed to supporting a diverse workplace and a diverse community of gamers. We celebrate people of all genders and identities, all races, cultures and creeds.

Von Tsume bis Prime1, von Aniplex bis Banpresto, von Pop Up Parade Figuren bis hin zu handgefertigten Resin Statuen‚Äì sie durchstreifen das Universum der Anime-Produkte, um die Sch√§tze der Otaku-Welt zu pr√§sentieren.

 

Doch Anistue ist nicht nur ein Gesch√§ft, es ist ein Schrein f√ºr die Liebe zu Anime. David und Eddy, zwei wahre Anh√§nger dieser kunstvollen Welt, leben und atmen Anime. exhibitors.INFO:
Art of Strategy, Wonder of Play.

We are a dynamic publisher of strategic and casual tabletop games based in the United States with offices in both Texas and Indiana. 

Founded in 2012 by Bryan Pope, we first gained recognition for creating the award-winning title Mage Wars. 

Since that time we have gone on to publish both original games and to bring titles from all around the world such as Onitama, Foundations of Rome, Aquatica and Air Land & Sea. With a recent push on smaller family friendly games such as ito, Cat and the Tower, Super Kawaii Pets and Number Chain, we have also expanded our lineup to include games for all levels!

We are also offer games exclusively for the Dice Tower Essentials line, curated in partnership with acclaimed reviewer Tom Vasel.

We continue to expand, showcasing both new and beloved games, appealing to casual gamers and hardcore enthusiasts alike.
exhibitors.NAME: Arcane Wonders

exhibitors.INFO:
Archon Studio

We have established ourselves as a prominent player in the board game, wargaming, and RPG terrain market. With such passion, we began creating our own board games, and now we're recognized for our commitment to innovation and producing exceptional miniatures.

We've loved miniatures ever since we were kids

We grew up with tabletop games, and we have since decided to make our own. Archon Studio is dedicated to creating amazing games and miniatures, challenging ourselves with more complex and detailed designs with every project. Our community is Archon's lifeblood - we share our passion with you and fulfill our dreams together. Project after project, we create models in the highest-quality plastic, making them worth painting and assembling.

WHAT MAKES US DIFFERENT?

At Archon Studio, we redefine tabletop gaming. Our innovation-driven approach crafts unique board games and miniatures, blending cutting-edge mechanics with captivating narratives. Immerse yourself in a world where attention to detail, exceptional quality, and community collaboration set us apart. See tabletop gaming from a new perspective ‚Äì where every play is an extraordinary adventure.
exhibitors.NAME: Archon Studio

exhibitors.INFO:
At Archona Games, our mission is more than just crafting board games; it‚Äôs about creating unforgettable moments that bring people together. We believe in the power of play to inspire, connect, and entertain, and it‚Äôs this belief that fuels our every endeavor. Our games aren‚Äôt just cardboard and components ‚Äì they‚Äôre gateways to new worlds, avenues for strategic thinking, and catalysts for endless laughter.

Our company culture is the heartbeat of who we are: passionate, energetic, and creative. These values aren‚Äôt just words on paper; they‚Äôre the driving force behind every decision we make and every game we produce. We embrace our passions, infusing them into every game mechanic, every line of rulebook, every pixel of artwork, and every piece of the game box. Our energy is infectious, pushing us to push the boundaries of what‚Äôs possible in board game design. We thrive on creativity, welcoming innovation with open arms and letting it shape our games into unique experiences that captivate players‚Äô imaginations.

So come, join us at the table as we continue to forge our core values into mighty fun games. Let‚Äôs create memories, laughter, and shared experiences that will echo through time. Welcome to the world of Archona Games, where the journey is as exciting as the destination.
exhibitors.NAME: Archona Games

exhibitors.INFO:

Our efforts to do this include localizing popular foreign games into Japanese, as well as introducing the unique and special games Japan is known for to international audiences.

We are also the hosts of Tokyo Game Market, the largest board game industry event in all of Asia.

The next Tokyo Game Market event will be held on 22nd and 23rd November 2025.

exhibitors.INFO: Ares Games is a board game publisher with offices in USA and Italy, established in 2011 to create quality hobby products for the international audience. Ares Games is the publisher of the award-winning "War of the Ring" board game, of the "Wings of Glory" range of airplane combat games and miniatures, and of the award-winning tactical ship-to-ship miniature game ‚ÄúSails of Glory‚Äù, and the cooperative tactical dungeon crawler ‚ÄúSword and Sorcery‚Äù. Its catalog also includes family games and euro games. Ares Games is also master distributor in the USA and other non-European countries of games published by some of the best European board game and role-playing game publishers.
exhibitors.NAME: Ares Games

exhibitors.INFO:
Arkada Studio is a French publisher specialized in hybrid board games enhanced by digital apps. Our creations blend the immersion of storytelling, cooperative adventures, and innovative gameplay with the support of a companion application.

We are the team behind:

  • Erune and Erune: Light & Darkness, a fantasy dungeon crawler with voice interaction.

  • Spark Riders 3000 and its expansion Galactic Modules, a family-friendly cooperative space adventure guided by an onboard computer.

  • Sifflard (Salami), a fun party game of bluff and risk-taking.

  • Legends of the Seas, our upcoming narrative pirate game with full voice acting.

At Arkada Studio, our mission is to create unique, story-driven, and accessible experiences that bridge the gap between board games and video games.
exhibitors.NAME: Arkada Studio

exhibitors.INFO:
Since 1992, Art of Games has been designing and manufacturing custom educational games for associations, NGOs, municipalities, and more (such as the Red Cross, Child Focus, King Baudouin Foundation, Belgian Development Cooperation, museums, etc.). To date, we have completed over 1250 projects.
We handle the entire development process, including game mechanics and principles, testing, fine-tuning, rule writing, graphic design, and production.

We also develop training games (business games and serious games) for companies such as 3M, Proximus, Citibank, KUL, Saint-Gobain and others.

Additionally, we act as manufacturers for other publishers and self-publishing game designers.

Alongside these services, we also publish our own games, including Avalam, LIXSO, Tabladwa, DAR, Le Cap est Bon, JoJack, Wordissimo, and Connecticut. Welcome on our booth 4B400.
Many of our games have received international awards. Avalam is the most awarded Belgian game.

exhibitors.INFO:
√úber asmodee Deutschland

Unter dem Dach der franz√∂sischen Verlagsgesellschaft asmodee arbeiten zurzeit vier Schwesterfirmen im deutschen Markt. Neben der in 2008 gegr√ºndeten asmodee GmbH geh√∂rt zu den deutschen Business Units auch die eigenst√§ndige Firma ADC Blackfire GmbH. Diese beiden Unternehmen sind erfolgreiche Distributoren f√ºr den Vertrieb von Brettspielen, Trading-Card-Systemen, Rollenspielb√ºchern, Merchandise-Produkten und Spielezubeh√∂r.

Seit 2018 geh√∂rt zur deutschen asmodee-Familie auch das eigenst√§ndige Entwicklungsstudio Lookout Spiele, welches sehr erfolgreiche Spiele f√ºr den internationalen Brettspielmarkt entwickelt. Die Lookout GmbH wurde im Jahr 2000 von Hanno Girke gegr√ºndet und ist bekannt f√ºr Kultklassiker wie Agricola (2007) des bekannten Autors Uwe Rosenberg sowie Caverna (2013), einer neuen Interpretation des Erfolgstitels, die von Kritikern gefeiert wurde.

Im Jahr 2019 wurde unter der Leitung von Adrian Alonso eine weitere Business Unit der deutschen asmodee-Familie gegr√ºndet. Das eigenst√§ndige Studio Gamegenic stellt hochwertiges Spielzubeh√∂r her, darunter Kartenh√ºllen, Kartenboxen, Binder, Seiten und mehr, um Spielkomponenten zu sch√ºtzen und das Spielerlebnis zu verbessern. Diese Produkte werden √ºber die asmodee-Distribution weltweit an den Handel verkauft.

Die asmodee GmbH wurde 2008 als Tochter der asmodee SAS in Frankreich gegr√ºndet und ist ein eigenst√§ndiger deutscher Vertrieb und Verlag f√ºr Gesellschaftsspiele. Als Teil der asmodee Group, die insgesamt √ºber 21 Niederlassungen in Europa, den USA und China verf√ºgt, arbeitet asmodee Deutschland international mit rund 30 Partnerverlagen zusammen. Viele der Partner z√§hlen weltweit zu den bekanntesten Verlagen in der Spielebranche. Mit ihnen bringt asmodee in Deutschland jedes Jahr neue Spiele auf den Markt, welche die Spieler fesseln und begeistern. Vom Hauptsitz des Unternehmens in Essen aus k√ºmmert sich asmodee Deutschland um das gesamte Spektrum der Verlags- und Vertriebsarbeit, von der Redaktion √ºber das Marketing bis hin zum Verkauf.

Mit seinem umfangreichen Sortiment an Spielen ‚Äì von Dobble und Werw√∂lfe von D√ºsterwald √ºber Just One (Spiel des Jahres 2019) bis hin zu Dixit (Spiel des Jahres 2010) oder 7 Wonders (Kennerspiel des Jahres 2011) ‚Äì bringt asmodee in Deutschland Spiele f√ºr jeden Geschmack auf den Markt. F√ºr seine Produkte legt asmodee gro√üen Wert auf herausragende Spiele. Das belegen auch viele Preise, welche die Spiele in asmodees Sortiment gewonnen haben: Auszeichnungen als Spiel des Jahres, Kennerspiel des Jahres, Spielehits f√ºr Familien und Experten, Nominierungen zum Spiel des Jahres, Kennerspiel des Jahres und Kinderspiel des Jahres, der Grafikpreis Graf Ludo und verschiedenste internationale Preise sind darunter zu finden.

Neben diesen Spielen vertreibt asmodee auch Spiele mit bekannten Lizenzen in Deutschland und anderen L√§ndern. Zu den Lizenzreihen z√§hlen Hits wie Star Wars, A Game of Thrones, Der Herr der Ringe, Arkham Horror sowie verschiedene Computerspiel-Lizenzen wie Fallout oder Civilization.

Das Ziel von asmodee ist es, das Spielen f√ºr m√∂glichst viele Menschen attraktiv zu machen. Aus diesem Grund unterst√ºtzt der Verlag auch zahlreiche Spieletage und Messen sowie den Fachhandel aktiv mit Aktionen und Personal.
exhibitors.NAME: Asmodee Deutschland GmbH

exhibitors.INFO:
üëã Hey there SPIEL, missed us?
Cause we‚Äôve missed you! ü•≤

And we‚Äôre super chuffed to be back with our legendary medieval BARPIG Tavern, full of our usual fun antics and hilarious challenges!


We‚Äôre also going to be playtesting our next game in development, SELF - an exploration in what makes us who we are.



What is BARPIG?

Prepare for an adventure unlike any other‚Äîwhere strategy meets sabotage, challenges spark chaos, and friendships are tested (but in the best way possible)!

BARPIG is a hilariously competitive, pocket-sized party game that blends the best of bar shenanigans, tabletop RPGs, and outrageous group challenges. Climb the levels, outwit your friends with take-that item cards, and roll the dice to decide your fate. But beware‚Äîyour so-called allies are just waiting for the perfect moment to turn the game (and your dignity) upside down!

With laugh-out-loud moments, fast-paced gameplay, and endless replayability, BARPIG is the adventure party game for everyone, anywhere! Whether you're at the bar, a game night, or just looking for the ultimate backstabbing, beer-fueled good time‚Äîthis is the pocket-sized party game you‚Äôve been waiting for!

So, grab your friends, embrace the ridiculousness, and let the adventure begin!


What is SELF?

A thought-provoking and surprising game that playfully challenges how we see gender‚Äîmatch visual art cards to dice-generated mixes of masculinity and femininity, and help the Self discover who they truly are.

Everyone has levels of masculinity and feminity, Self uses a random dice roll to give a representation of this. Players choose an artwork card that best represents these levels, in order to communicate this to the player currently the ‚ÄúSelf‚Äù in helping them figure out what those levels are.

üß∏ How ‚Äúmanly‚Äù is a teddy bear? üíÖ Is red really a more feminine colour if it‚Äôs painted on a space rocket? ü§î SELF is wildly engaging, thought-provoking, and full of surprises‚Äîchallenging the way we see ourselves and each other in the most fun and creative way!

üé≤ So, come by, have a blast, and discover what it really means to be your true SELF!
exhibitors.NAME: BARPIG - The Adventure Party Game

With representative offices and factories in Beijing and Shenzhen, we deliver high-quality, trendy toys and board games to both domestic and international markets. Leveraging high-quality domestic and international IP resources, we have established a business presence in the development and manufacturing of trendy toys, board games, and derivative products, connecting the entire industry chain and achieving integrated operations across the entire upstream and downstream sectors, making us a unique force in the industry.

Moe, Chinese style, ancient costumes, animals

BGM 2018 Best Chinese Original Board Game Award, 2nd Place

Our recent works extend and expand upon our past works. On the one hand, we strive to more comprehensively broaden the dimensions of our IPs, such as Cute Otter Jianghu and Cute Otter Jianghu - Battle of Good and Evil. On the other hand, we delve deeper and experiment with traditional Chinese styles, such as the Guanfu Cat One Cat One Bowl series.

As an agency, BRYX also designs tailor-made sets in small production runs: from concept through 3D design & prototyping, sourcing & quality assurance to packaging, fulfillment, and event staging. This makes brand worlds fast to test, easy to scale, and usable as merchandise or incentives.

exhibitors.INFO:
Our Belief: Games should gather friends, not dust.

We believe your game nights deserve the best. That's why we founded Banana Joe Games. To create memorable games that are easy to learn and explain, yet packed with stylish mechanics that keep you coming back for more.

Our goal is for our games to click with you and your friends instantly. Every player is different, and we believe games should embrace your creativity instead of putting some boundaries to it. That's why we want to create experiences that let you continuously discover and refine your own playstyle, starting from your very first match.

Hence our motto: Be You. Replay.

We also believe that games should look and feel as good as they play. Our nostalgic VHS-style cases are designed not just for a sleek display, but are also custom-engineered to keep every piece perfectly in the right place.

We pour our hearts into every project to ensure that when you pick up a game labeled ‚ÄúBanana Joe Games‚Äù you get two key experiences:

‚Ä¢‚Å† ‚Å†Quick to Play, Deeply Engaging: Our rulebooks are light and straightforward, getting you into the game faster. You'll spend more time playing and less time reading, even as you explore surprisingly deep and complex gameplay.

‚Ä¢‚Å† ‚Å†A Joy to Own: Our games are designed to be enjoyed even when closed. Exhibit them neatly on your shelf without creating unstable towers, and easily pick them up whenever you're ready to play.

With Banana Joe Games, we promise you top-notch design, from gameplay to visuals.
exhibitors.NAME: Banana Joe Games

exhibitors.INFO:
Bantam Planet is a North American game publisher established on June 25th, 2020. The company was founded by Ike Brunicardi as Creator, World Builder, and Game Director, and Max Palmer as Conductor and Director of Business and Growth. Based in the U.S. and aiming to distribute worldwide, Bantam Planet is showcasing its first game: Bantam West.

Bantam West introduces the planet Bantam, a diminutive world whose resilient inhabitants are fierce and seasoned fighters. Home to many different biomes and cultures, Bantam is brimming with cowboys and cultists, merchants and mobsters, politicians, soldiers, and even mythological beasts. Players and fans will explore new environments and territories with each game in the Bantam Series, revealing undiscovered enemies and lore.

Mission Statement: Our mission is to provide you with an unforgettable tabletop experience. We aim to create games that build rich narratives, bring joy to players, and provide challenging puzzles. Our three pillars for creation are rock-solid mechanics, an expansive theme in both breadth and depth and gorgeous artwork. While the complexity and detail conveyed by our games might not suit everyone's interests, we strive to create an all-inclusive world. Bantam is a world wherein anyone can be a hero regardless of race, color, gender, religion, age, disability, or national origin.

"Bantam Planet... Wish You Were Here!"
exhibitors.NAME: Bantam Planet

exhibitors.INFO:

Mermaid‚Äôs Song - the card game of cutthroat mermaid diplomacy encourages you to hire mermaid ambassadors, empower them to entice sea creatures to your side and take the Coral Throne to rule with an iron fin. Beware the Kraken and the other players who will try to block your efforts and entice your sea creatures away from you. New alternate rules available this year. Suitable for ages 8+, 2-6 players. Beautiful, handpainted watercolor art on each card, also available as A4-sized high quality prints.

Crows versus Cats - the card game of collecting and chaos. Pick your crow and collect their favorite shiny thing, but watch out for thieving magpies, playful cats, and winds of change. A little strategy, a little luck, and some take-that silliness keeps this game fun right to the end. A new game available for the first time at Spiel. Suitable for ages 8+, 3-6 players. Beautiful, handpainted watercolor art on each card, also available as A4-sized high quality prints.

Velcrows - the birds that stick together. We‚Äôve got pins, magnets, stickers, and other crow items available. Each purchase supports LGBTQIA+ charities, becasue we believe the flock must stick together.

exhibitors.INFO:
About Bezzerwizzer Studio

With a passion for knowledge, curiosity and playfulness, BEZZERWIZZER Studio was founded in Denmark in 2006 by Jesper and Birgitte B√ºlow. Since then, we have built a portfolio of fun family, trivia and party games which, to date, have sold more than eleven million copies in over 40 countries.

Today we are part of the French company Asmodee Group, one of the world‚Äôs leading board game publishers. During the coming years, we plan to introduce our games into several new markets. Based in Copenhagen, BEZZERWIZZER Studio conjures up game concepts and ferrets out fascinating facts ‚Äì all in close collaboration with freelancers, retailers and fans.

Our key words are togetherness, creativity, knowledge and quality. We take pride in the fact that our games are enjoyed by players of all ages in any social situation.  And we are driven by the desire to give even more people around the world the opportunity to play their way to new discoveries and fun memories.

exhibitors.INFO:
Biberstein Spiele ist deine neue Anlaufstelle f√ºr hochwertige, thematische und unterhaltsame Brettspiele.

F√ºr den Beginn unserer Reise als Brettspielverlag konnten wir den exzellenten spanischen Partner Looping Games gewinnen. Besonders hervorzuheben ist dessen Reihe Serie 1900, aus der wir f√ºr unseren eigenen Verlagsstart die beiden Spiele 1980 Sixtinische Kapelle und 1998 ISS gewinnen konnten. Diese beiden Spiele bilden den Grundstein, um so die Reihe als Jahrhundertreihe f√ºr den deutschsprachigen Raum zu ver√∂ffentlichen.

Dieses Jahr geht unsere gemeinsame Reise der Jahrhundertreihe mit zwei Neuerscheinungen direkt weiter!

1906 San Francisco: Deine Planungsk√ºnste sind gefragt, da du den Einwohnern San Franciscos beim Wiederaufbau mit Tatkraft und Innovationskunst zur Seite stehen musst. Erwerbe Baupl√§tze, entferne Schutt, errichte H√§user und entwickle die Stadtinfrastruktur. Durch den einzigartigen Aktionsmechanismus und die dynamische Zugfolge gleicht kein Spiel dem anderen. Mit deiner Hilfe erwacht die Stadt zu neuem Leben.

1923 Cotton Club: Leite deinen eigenen Jazzclub und stelle unter Beweis, dass du ein H√§ndchen f√ºr gute Gesch√§fte zu Zeiten der Prohibition hast. Sichere deinen Club durch Partner in der kriminellen Welt, beschaffe geschmuggelten Alkohol und engagiere herausragende K√ºnstler, um die einflussreichsten Ber√ºhmtheiten der Zeit willkommen zu hei√üen. Jazz war noch nie so spielerisch!

Die Jahrhundertreihe zeichnet sich dadurch aus, dass historische Ereignisse aus dem 20. Jahrhundert thematisch, spielerisch und gestalterisch geschickt miteinander verkn√ºpft werden, um f√ºr ein mitrei√üendes und immersives Spielerlebnis zu sorgen. Sowohl die Spielmechaniken als auch die herausragenden Illustrationen von Pedro Soto unterstreichen das Thema und versetzen einen als Spieler direkt an den Ort des Geschehens.

Begleite uns auf unserer Reise in andere Welten und Zeiten. Lass uns zusammen unvergessliche Momente schaffen.

Biberstein Spiele - VerDAMMt gut!
exhibitors.NAME: Biberstein Spiele

exhibitors.INFO:
For over a decade, Biosymfonix has been crafting award-winning serious games that make complex ideas engaging, accessible, and playful. Our work has brought together learners, researchers, and professionals in experiences that turn curiosity into discovery.

Now, at Essen Spiel, we‚Äôre proud to take the next step in our journey: presenting our first game designed with entertainment at its core and education as a playful bonus. Built with the same care, creativity, and love of complexity that define all our projects, this new chapter marks our expansion from serious play to seriously fun play.

exhibitors.INFO:
Black Beacon Games & Era of Tribes

Black Beacon Games is an independent board game publisher based in Germany, dedicated to creating immersive, thematic strategy games that combine deep gameplay with high replay value. The studio is driven by a passion for historical settings, engaging mechanics, and premium component quality.

Its flagship title, Era of Tribes, is a grand strategy and civilization-building board game that lets players lead their tribe through the ages of early human history. Starting in the Stone Age, tribes expand their territory, develop culture and science, engage in diplomacy, and wage wars to shape the destiny of their people.

Unlike many civ-style games, Era of Tribes emphasizes both strategic depth and player freedom. Each tribe comes with unique strengths, and multiple paths to victory ensure that no two games ever feel the same. With a modular map, asymmetric factions, expansion packs, and solo & cooperative modes, the game offers a truly epic experience for both casual gamers and seasoned strategists.

Praised for its historical flavor, rich variety, and immersive progression, Era of Tribes has found a growing community of fans worldwide. Backed successfully through crowdfunding, the game continues to expand with new content, upgraded components, and translations, making it accessible to players across Europe and beyond.

At its core, Black Beacon Games stands for:

  • üèõÔ∏è Epic historical themes

  • üé≤ Innovative mechanics

  • üåç Global player community

  • ‚ú® High-quality production

With Era of Tribes as its flagship project, Black Beacon Games is committed to delivering strategy board games that are as inspiring as they are challenging.
exhibitors.NAME: Black Beacon Games

exhibitors.INFO:

Black Diamond Creatives, LLC is a creative development studio dedicated to partnering with STEM and other game innovators to transform their ideas into thriving, independent ventures. Our unique model focuses on collaboration and shared ownership: we help bring projects from concept to production while ensuring creators retain meaningful equity in the businesses we build together.

We specialize in developing engaging tabletop and educational games that merge creativity with learning. Our current portfolio includes:

  • üß† Quibble ‚Äì A fast-paced, story-building word puzzle game that challenges players to think quickly and creatively.

  • üß¨ Complexity ‚Äì A STEM-focused strategy game where players build molecular machines by combining DNA codons, bringing molecular biology to life through gameplay.

  • üé® Artbitrage ‚Äì A game that playfully explores the unpredictable economics of the art world, teaching players about galleries, value, and strategy in the creative marketplace.

Through strategic development, marketing, and production support, we empower creators to focus on what they do best‚Äîinnovating‚Äîwhile we help build sustainable brands and businesses around their ideas.

exhibitors.INFO:
Blue Donut Games Ltd. is a UK based games designer and publisher.

We design and develop our own range of tabletop games. We are also developing video games.

I‚Äôve spent over twenty years developing systems. From computer systems for multi-media to B2B and retail e-commerce working out the logic flow for some pretty wacky pricing and discounting structures. Some of the oldest names in games making and publishing have used systems I had to work out! Before that I worked in storyboarding, graphic art, comics, T.V Commercials and so on. So I have a good technical and creative background.

It was a very talented young game designer called Adam Carter-Groves who first introduced me to developing card games six years ago. We developed together Line The Skateboard Card Game, Immortal Paths and Devices. He is now a senior games designer at the legendary UK Games Studio, Team17. Adam taught me loads about games, but the best thing was that he inspired me to not just try to get a game out at a show but create a dedicated business to the tabletop industry.

Working as a designer myself, I have created the tile-based card collecting game called Horror in the Library. This is my first solo game, which was rather ambitious, but it was one of those game ideas that would keep one awake at night. I have had a lot of help from my fantastic team to get it turned it to a coherent, well thought, and beautiful game.

Working in boardgames is a labour of love. You won‚Äôt get rich and it‚Äôs expensive. I‚Äôve invested a lot of time and money doing it but it‚Äôs such fun. We‚Äôve got off to an amazing start and we‚Äôre grateful for all the support we‚Äôve had from other industry partners, publishers, designers and customers. Our customers are invaluable. The people we meet at UK Games Expo and Spiel have been an amazing support. We value their knowledge as many are veteran players and a few have created their own games. It‚Äôs been very humbling when well known designers have visited us and played our games then given us feedback.

There is an awesome amount of camaraderie between fellow creators. They share advice and encouragement. It‚Äôs unusual in what really is a very crowded marketplace. There is always room for another designer and publisher.

The last year has been very hard for everyone in the world. The Board Game industry has had a tough time and we have lost a lot of small creators for the moment. So we are very, very thankful that we have survived and that we are part of a group of companies that have worked hard to support this endeavour.
exhibitors.NAME: Blue Donut Studios

exhibitors.INFO:
What is BoardGameGeek?

BoardGameGeek is an online resource and community that aims to be the definitive source for board game and card game content. The site is updated on a real-time basis by its large and still growing user base ‚Äî more than three million registered users! ‚Äî making the Geek the largest and most up-to-date place to get gaming information! You can become a registered member of BGG for free, although we welcome your contributions to the site in the form of ratings, reviews, and thoughts on games to the existing database!

BGG features reviews, ratings, images, play-aids, translations, and session reports from board game geeks around the world, as well as live discussion forums. In addition, every day nearly a hundred game trades pass through the hands of registered members, as well as transactions in the Geek Market. If you are new to the site and are wondering where to begin, you might start with the Guide to BoardGameGeek.

What is the BoardGameGeek Store?

As the largest and most comprehensive website supporting the board gaming hobby, we have relationships with most publishers in the business, and these publishers often produce various goodies for their games. Most of these promos were originally offered as preorder bonuses, or were made available at a convention of some sort. If you weren't able to get to show or special event, you may be able to get them at the BGG Store.

We also specialize in contracts with publishers to use their game art to make exclusive game upgrade products under our GeekUp line, including bits, bags, boxes, and stunning wall art inspired by games.

Finally, we also sell various BoardGameGeek merchandise such as t-shirts, mugs, and other household items so fans of the site can get in on some BoardGameGeek swag!
exhibitors.NAME: BoardGameGeek

exhibitors.INFO:
BONAPARTE Company s.r.o. was founded in 1993 under the name Bonaparte in Plzen, Czech Republic. Beginning in 2011, our company cooperated with Ms Maureen Hiron, the famous creator of many globally best-selling games who is now greatly. The first game we released under the Stragoo brand was Continuo, produced in our factory in Czechia, followed quickly by Grabolo, Grabolo Junior and Tripolo, whose production was eventually moved to China. We participated in their design from the beginning, which sold well all over Europe. Ms Hiron was incredibly enthusiastic and convinced her other business partners to produce games in cooperation with us using our original concepts and designs. We continued to work closely with Ms Hiron until her passing in 2022, not only in the visual form of the games, but also in consultation about game variants and possibilities. We own several European and worldwide licenses for her other games, such as Colo-Rolo, SneakPeak, Catz-Ratz-Batz and others. Under the Stragoo brand we also pusblish games by other authors that fit into the concept of fast perception games packed in a tin box. Our major clients include companies in Hungary, Spain, Portugal, Germany, Korea, Israel, Italy, poland, the Netherlands, Scandinavia and now in Ukraine and France as well.

Under the Stragoo brand, a number of new games were created in the original packaging - a round tin box and a plastic cards inside, which for the most part came from the world-famous game author Maureen Hiron. These are fast-paced, reflex games with simple rules that entertain not only children of different ages, but also their parents, which is their undeniable advantage.

The bestsellers of this edition is Grabolo Junior, Tripolo and SneakPeak, which are exported to many European countries (eg.Spain, Hungary, France) and beyond (eg. South Korea).

exhibitors.INFO:
Our Mission

We believe that board games are a social good that helps us to develop deeper relationships with people around us. We are on a mission to develop and to publish award-winning games and to bring quality games to as many people as we can.

We strive to:

Challenge Minds
We design games that challenge intellects, encouraging strategic thinking, problem-solving, and creativity. Our games are more than entertainment; they are exercises for the brain, sparking curiosity and encouraging continuous learning.
Forge Connections
Gaming is a universal language that transcends boundaries. We aim to forge meaningful connections between players, whether they are family, friends, or strangers. Our games create shared moments that strengthen relationships and create lasting memories.
Fuel Imagination
We believe in the power of imagination to transform the ordinary into the extraordinary. Our games are crafted to fuel the imagination, transporting players to fantastical worlds and inspiring endless possibilities.

Our Values

At Brain Games, we play lots of games and develop our own, award-winning new games.
We see, first-hand, how playing games helps us to become better humans to each other.
And these behaviours and values form the code for how we run our company.

  1. We like to have fun while playing games, in our daily work and in life;

  2. We take meaningful action towards our goals and avoid unnecessary moves;

  3. We act honestly and take responsibility for our actions and choices;

  4. We are inclusive in that we appreciate our differences and are patient with each other;

  5. We support learning something new every day;

  6. We strive to introduce games to new customers and in new settings;

  7. We encourage our team to become knowledgeable and passionate about game design.
exhibitors.NAME: Brain Games

exhibitors.INFO:
For those new to our community, Chessex is a name born from decades of experience and innovation in gaming. Our founder, Donald Reents, began his journey in 1980 with his gaming store, Games of Berkeley.  Don fueled his passion for games by making gaming accessories with Berkeley Game Company in 1981. Don transitioned into distribution with Berkeley Game Distributors in 1982 and then manufacturing in 1984. Chessex Manufacturing officially began making dice starting in 1987.  

Don is always thinking of new and innovative features to add to his dice. For example, Chessex was the first company to manufacture d4s with the numbers on the top point area of the die instead of the bottom edge. The Chessex Tens10‚Ñ¢ die shape was designed independently at the same time as Lou Zocchi‚Äôs style of percentile d10. Chessex also replaced the dots next to the 6s and 9s and instead used an underline to indicate their orientation. Don is known for pioneering your favorite dice color styles such as Speckled¬Æ, Scarab¬Æ, Borealis¬Æ, Gemini¬Æ, Nebula¬Æ, and many more.

Today, Chessex is still motivated by our founding mission: to make high-quality dice that are affordable for all gamers, because you can never have too many dice! 

As Donald once said, ‚ÄúI didn‚Äôt get into this business to make a lot of money; I simply did it because I liked games. It‚Äôs all because of you that I made Chessex, and it has become what it is today.‚Äù
exhibitors.NAME: Chessex

About De Tinnen Roos / DTR Spincasting ‚Äì Professionals in Miniatures

We‚Äôve been part of SPIEL Essen for many years and always bring a combination of high-end production expertise and hands-on fun to the gaming world. Based in the Netherlands, we produce miniatures, tokens, and game components in metal, resin, and plastic ‚Äì all in-house. Our specialties include:

  • Contract casting, spincasting, injection molding & 3D printing (DLP)

  • Prototyping and 3D design, including mold making, 3D scanning, and vulcanizing

  • Supplying machines and materials for companies who want to do their own production

  • Workshops and global training sessions ‚Äì at your location, online, or in our own factory

At SPIEL, It‚Äôs Always a Celebration!

Our booth is one big celebration of creativity and craftsmanship. Visitors can:

  • Join our "Paint & Take" area ‚Äì paint a mini and take it home

  • Have their face 3D scanned and turned into a custom miniature

  • See live demos of how miniatures are made ‚Äì from digital sculpt to casting

We‚Äôre also proud to be a partner of Remarkable Miniatures home | remarkable miniatures ‚Äì a European initiative that unites artists, designers, and producers to create and distribute top-tier miniatures, locally and sustainably.

At De Tinnen Roos, we combine craftsmanship, technology, and a passion for gaming. Whether it‚Äôs one custom figure or thousands for a board game release ‚Äì we‚Äôll show you how it‚Äôs done, and how much fun it can be.

In our Fashion Area, everything revolves around fashion and matching accessories, while gaming fans will find what they are looking for in our Gaming Area, where the focus lies on all forms of analog and digital gaming culture. Those interested in traditional Japanese culture should definitely stop by the adjacent Congress Center South, where you can chat with various clubs and discover the special features of Japan in our Matsuri (based on classic Japanese folk festivals).

exhibitors.INFO:
Thomas Denkmeier (Austria)

What makes D&D special:

Dominate & Delegate is inspired by Command & Conquer. A game I played back in the 90s and still play passionately on the PC. Surprisingly, it is the first implementation of the PC game. Of course, according to the agreement with EA Inc, I had to change all forms, pictures, logos and names. My board game is not designed for a large mass of customers to generate high profits. Like many of my projects (e.g. "Katakis" music video, "Die Maschinenst√ºrmer"-LARP and my carnival costumes and parades) D&D is a pure fan project to realize myself and to share my enthusiasm with like-minded people. Even as a child I felt the urge to share enthusiasms. A good example: I remember that at that time it was impossible for me to watch the first time "Star Wars" all alone. On the other hand, I always felt the urge to imitate something I was enthusiastic about. In my childhood these were the following examples: Building Star Wars spaceships with LEGO. My carnival costume at the age of 12 as "Boush". And the 2 arcade games "1943" and "Thunder Cross" using the gamemaker SEUCK on the C64 and Amiga.

Dominate & Delegate is designed as a 0-business. So, my goal is to share my passion as much as possible and not to make any financial losses.

Characteristics regarding the game mechanics:

  • Reviewers reported that the game rules are designed to reflect the video game as best as possible. As a result, the rules are coherent and easy to remember, even though they are a relatively large amount of textual material.

  • In a skirmish (a symmetrical battle 1-3PL), there is no typical strategic recipe to win. Rather, it doesn't matter what kind of strategy you choose, each is threatening to your opponent and could lead to victory.

  • The battle system, while very tactical, is quick to play. There is also no activation token / health point fiddling around. This has the advantage, if in large-scale battles many figures are set up or 4 players exist, each of the players does not have to wait long until it is his turn again.

  • The content of the box is extremely extensive. It consists of 272 plastic faction figures in 4 different colors. There are many modular base plates for outdoor and indoor setups in addition to the large 560 x 560 game board.

  • Extensive 2PL campaign with 39 missions, many ramifications, many secrets and high replay value.

  • Special 1PL Camapign.

  • Extensive tactical options and mechanics: pinch tactics, resource mining, base building, secret production, stealth units, artillery, air units, transport units, super weapon, water units, reward cards, energy management, infiltrators/Capturers, Fog of War, bridges, walls and civilian buildings.

  • Both outdoor missions and indoor missions.
exhibitors.NAME: Dominate&Delegate - the Command&Conquer boardgame

Who We Are

Since 1995, Fantasy Flight Games has earned a reputation for its innovative gameplay, immersive gaming experiences, and top-quality game components. As a leading hobby game company based out of Roseville, Minnesota, FFG publishes a massive array of board and card games. 

Many of FFG‚Äôs most popular titles are a mixture of beloved licenses‚Äîsuch as Star Wars‚Ñ¢, Marvel, J.R.R. Tolkien‚Äôs The Lord of the Rings, and George R.R. Martin‚Äôs A Song of Ice and Fire‚Äîand our own proprietary licenses, such as Arkham Horror Files, Terrinoth Legends, and Twilight Imperium. 

Throughout the course of the studio‚Äôs history, FFG has created and published games in multiple genres, including board, card, miniature, and roleplaying games, as well as trademarked Living Card Games¬Æ in over thirty languages and distributed them to more than fifty territories. In 2014, FFG further expanded its international reach by merging with the Asmodee Group. 

You can find us on  Facebook and Instagram and follow @FFGames on Twitter. We also have FFG Live, a series of livestreams that we host on our YouTube channel.

Our Philosophy

exhibitors.INFO:
At Fitz&Pops Tabletops, we don't just roll the dice on ordinary‚Äîwe're board with boring! We're committed to crafting games that break the mold with wild themes, engaging stories, and clever mechanics that'll keep you guessing.

Our games are packed with humor and quirky characters that'll have you laughing while you strategize. Don't let the fun looks fool you‚Äîour games may make you chuckle, but they'll also make you think!

We believe the best games combine accessible fun with surprising depth, creating experiences that are easy to enjoy but challenging to master. Why play it safe when you can play it spectacular?

Stefano Virgilli

Meet Your Board Game Mechanisms Mixologist

Meet Stefano, who blends board game mechanisms like a master bartender crafts cocktails. Give him any combination of mechanics‚Äîworker placement, engine building, area control‚Äîand he'll shake them up into something surprisingly fresh and entertaining. What sets him apart is speed: he can rapidly prototype game concepts, finding that sweet spot where different systems create satisfying "aha!" moments that keep players coming back for more.

Ernestas Jasillonis

Who Needs AI When You Have This Guy?

Meet Ernestas, our art director who proves that human creativity still reigns supreme. While the world rushes toward automated everything, Ernestas takes the opposite approach‚Äîevery single illustration is meticulously crafted through his hands-on art direction and artistic execution. No algorithms, no shortcuts, just pure creative vision and genuine human artistry at its finest.
exhibitors.NAME: Fitz&Pop's Tabletops

Vor 15 Jahren erschien unser Tabletop Freebooter's Fate. Ein schnelles, taktisch anspruchsvolles Tabletop Miniaturen Spiel f√ºr zwei oder mehr Spieler, das Piraten und Fantasyelemente miteinander verbindet. Es wird Dir gefallen. Wie sollte es anders sein, bei diesen Zutaten? Raublustige Piraten. Grog-stemmende Goblins! Mysteri√∂se Assassinen! Standhafte Imperiale! Skrupellose S√∂ldner! Papageien! Und viele mehr. Eine Welt voller Schurken, Halunken, Helden, Damen, Weibsbilder und vielen anderem. Mit tausend Holzbeinen! Oh, und alles ohne W√ºrfel!

Jetzt erblickt Ascending Fate, das w√ºrfellose Sci-Fi-Skirmish-Tabletop-Spiel das Licht der interstellaren Welt. Alles im 34 mm Ma√üstab und mit einfachen und doch herausfordernden Regeln.

exhibitors.INFO:
Friends of The Table are an indie tabletop game studio from Melbourne, Australia. Started by two lovers of all things tabletop, Tom and Luke. We have been playing boardgames and roleplaying games together for years, and we both had been working on our own games for a long time. In 2023 we decided to start our own studio and publish some of our concepts. Our games are made with love and passion in the hopes to share some of this with other gamers around the world.

Our first product, Those Who Dare - The Stone To Space Age RPG, is an historic fiction TTRPG. Play your own fictional character in any era of human history, or it‚Äôs future. You choose when and where you want to play, or use our end-to-end storytelling to visit the descendents of one group down through the ages, or be time-hoppers jumping from age to age. The choice is yours!

We will also have playable demos of our two new games coming soon.
Nothing Left (But To Cry) is a party card game that invites you to laugh at the existential dread of every day life. Do your best to cope as life throws crisis after crisis at you, untill there is nothing left, but to cry.
Miskatonic High is our next TTRPG, using the same Daring System we built for Those Who Dare. Take on the role of highschoolers at a finishing school attached to H.P. Lovecraft‚Äôs famous Miskatonic University. You aren‚Äôt the A-team, you aren‚Äôt even graduates. But as you navigate your school and social life you and your friends will realise that when eldritch horrors are coming for your school, you will have to step up!
exhibitors.NAME: Friends of the Table

It is a pleasure for us to introduce our company, a furniture factory with over 60 years of experience in the sector. Unlike carpenters or cabinetmakers, our strength lies in industrial manufacturing, which allows us to offer high-quality tables at competitive prices.

Although we do not produce custom-made pieces, we have adapted by manufacturing tables in the most demanded sizes on the market. For decades, more than 95% of households have trusted the material we use‚Äîmelamine with heat-sealed edging‚Äîthanks to its durability, practicality, and accessibility.

By applying industrial production processes, we have succeeded in reducing both costs and delivery times, making a product that was once exclusive available to a much broader audience. Today, our tables are priced on par with any conventional option, without compromising quality or design.

We look forward to sharing more about our work and exploring new opportunities for collaboration at this event.

exhibitors.INFO:
Funtails: stories that play out.

Immerse yourself in our new products and meet us in person at SPIEL in Essen.

At Funtails, we create game worlds with attention to detail and stories that captivate you. Our game mechanics tell a story, too. Our new releases, Luthier and Dark Romance, transport you to two distinct places. In Luthier, you can hear the soft strumming of strings and a plane gliding over wood. Luthier embodies precision craftsmanship and decisions that alter every sound. In Dark Romance, you wander through moonlit alleys full of secrets, betrayal, and intense encounters.

Whether you're a collector, a gamer, or a curious explorer, you'll find games with heart and character‚Äîand sometimes a touch of betrayal. Come by, try out our new releases, chat with our team, and maybe take home a new favorite story. We look forward to seeing you and hearing your stories. If you have any questions about the OD Link, please let us know.

Until then,
exhibitors.NAME: Funtails

exhibitors.INFO: GRANNA is a Polish board game publisher based in Warsaw, which has been providing unique experiences to board game enthusiasts for over 30 years. The company‚Äôs mission is to promote learning through play, which it achieves by publishing valuable educational and entertainment games. exhibitors.INFO:
UAB KADABRA

Leading Game Distribution & Development Company in the Baltics

UAB KADABRA stands as one of the premier gaming distribution companies in the Baltic region, specializing in high-quality board games, card games, and recreational products. With our comprehensive expertise spanning distribution, localization, and original game development, we serve as the bridge between international gaming excellence and the Baltic markets.

Core Business Activities

Distribution & Retail Excellence: We operate an extensive distribution network with our flagship HOBBYSHOP retail stores strategically positioned across Lithuania and Latvia. Our comprehensive distribution reach covers all three Baltic states, ensuring maximum market penetration and accessibility throughout the region.

Original Game Development: KADABRA actively collaborates with Lithuanian board game designers and authors, fostering local talent while developing innovative gaming experiences. This commitment to original content creation positions us as both distributors and creators within the gaming ecosystem.

Localization Expertise: We specialize in professional game localization into Baltic languages, ensuring cultural authenticity and linguistic precision. This service significantly contributes to the preservation and development of regional gaming culture.

Market Position & Partnerships

Our strategic partnerships with leading international game publishers enable us to deliver premium gaming experiences across the Baltic markets. We maintain relationships with top-tier manufacturers while simultaneously developing our proprietary product lines, creating a unique portfolio that serves diverse regional preferences.

Product Portfolio

  • Family Board Games: Comprehensive selection for all age groups

  • Strategic Games: Advanced gaming experiences for enthusiasts

  • Educational Games: Learning-focused products for children

  • Party Games: Social entertainment solutions

  • Collectible Games: Specialized products for collectors

  • Radio-Controlled Models: Technical recreational products

  • Puzzles & Brain Teasers: Cognitive development products

Professional Services

Retail Consultation: Expert guidance in game selection and market trends Regional Distribution: Comprehensive wholesale services across Baltic states Market Intelligence: Deep understanding of Baltic gaming preferences and cultural nuances Event Participation: Active presence at gaming conventions and trade shows throughout the region

Digital Presence & Marketing

We maintain robust digital engagement through multiple channels including our e-commerce platform and active social media presence, ensuring continuous connection with our growing Baltic gaming community.

Industry Recognition

exhibitors.INFO:
About the Yu-Gi-Oh! TRADING CARD GAME

The Yu-Gi-Oh! TRADING CARD GAME is one of the most popular trading card games in the world with over 25 billion cards sold. It is a game of strategy, where players create individual Decks of cards collected from Structure Decks and Booster Packs. Two players engage in a Duel while using cards that represent powerful Monsters, magical Spells and surprising Traps. Duelists with well-constructed Decks, dominating monsters, solid strategy and good fortune are the victors in the Yu-Gi-Oh! TCG. Konami Digital Entertainment B.V. is the exclusive licensee and rights holder to the Yu-Gi-Oh! TCG in the Europe, the Middle East and Africa.  

About Konami Digital Entertainment

Konami Digital Entertainment, which is the core company of Konami Group, develops entertaining content for mobile, console and card games. The company is known for global franchises such as eFootball‚Ñ¢, Metal Gear, Silent Hill, Castlevania, and Contra, as well as the Yu-Gi-Oh! Trading Card Game series.

exhibitors.INFO:
Lonny Games is a specialized board game publisher based in Austria, focusing exclusively on the development, production, and distribution of 18xx games ‚Äì a niche within the board gaming world aimed at experienced players. The name goes back to founder and designer Leonhard "Lonny" Orgler, who is internationally renowned for his innovative and well-crafted 18xx designs.

Focus and Philosophy:
The company‚Äôs philosophy is to combine deep strategic decision-making, economic simulation, and historically inspired railway networks in its games. Each title pays homage to Francis Tresham‚Äôs classic 1830 system, while expanding on its foundation with original mechanisms, new challenges, and often regional-historical themes.

The games are typically produced in small print runs, making them especially popular among collectors and 18xx enthusiasts worldwide.

Target Audience:
Lonny Games caters to a dedicated community of heavy gamers who value economic depth, long-term planning, and competitive interaction. The games are not designed for casual players, but for groups who enjoy engaging with a single game over several hours‚Äîor even days.

Distinctive Features:

  • Own online shop

  • Regular updates and variants for existing titles

  • Close collaboration with the 18xx community (e.g., via BGG, conventions, Discord)

  • High standards of quality in components and layout

Conclusion:
Lonny Games stands for expert-level board games created with passion by one of the most prominent designers in the 18xx genre. For those who love complex economic systems, tactical stock manipulation, and the construction of historical railway networks, these games offer depth, challenge‚Äîand personality.
exhibitors.NAME: Lonny Games

exhibitors.INFO:
Lookout studio was founded in 2000 by Hanno Girke. Driven by his passion and a dedicated team of boardgame enthusiasts, Lookout knows how to put fun to your gaming tables. The studio‚Äôs portfolio of top rated Eurogames (Agricola, Caverna, Hallertau), family-oriented crowd pleasers like Forest Shuffle, B√§renpark, Patchwork or Mandala, never fails to entertain. Innovations like the interactive Paper Point&Click adventure book series (Cantaloop, Eppi) score points, as will the Smart Scoring App for Forest Shuffle. Always a frontrunner in the industry, Lookout studio installed the Lookout GreenLine in 2023, to make boardgames more eco-friendly.

More than 140 published titles in 25 years were decorated with awards like Kennerspiel des Jahres (Isle of Skye, 2016), Agricola (Deutscher Spiele Preis 2008, special award for complex games), Forest Shuffle (Deutscher Spiele Preis 2024) and many others.

Since 2018, Lookout Games is a studio within Asmodee Group.

exhibitors.INFO:
Founded in 2013 by designer Perepau Llistosella and illustrator Pedro Soto, Looping Games was born from a shared passion for board games. Combining creative design with captivating visuals, our mission is to bring to life the kinds of games we love to play ‚Äî strategic, thematic, and beautifully crafted.

Our Mission

We are commited to publishing exceptional games that keep the spirit of analog gaming alive in an increasingly digital world. At Looping Games, we believe in the power of tabletop games to bring people together, offering both fun and intellectually stimulating experiences in equal measure.
From early prototypes to the final product, we love every step of the process: collaborating closely with designers, carefully curating themes and artwork, and perfecting every component to deliver small-box games with big impact.
For us, board games are more than entertainment ‚Äî they‚Äôre a meaningful way to connect and share quality time around the table.

Our Team

  • Pedro Soto ‚Äì Illustrator and graphic designer

  • Ferran Renalias ‚Äì Game developer

Our Game Lines

  • 1900 Series: Compact games with rich narratives set throughout the 20th century.

  • Historical Novel Series: Flip-and-write games inspired by iconic literary works, beginning with a Jules Verne trilogy.

  • Old-school games: Rediscovered classics‚Äîtimeless favorites brought back to life with care and passion.

We play, and we love playing.
And that passion fuels everything we do.

About Us

NASTOLA Games is a publisher and online store for light family and party games that combine humor, strategy, and a touch of luck to create unforgettable gaming experiences.

Founded in 2018 in Bulgaria as an online shop for board games and puzzles, we unexpectedly discovered our passion for game design at the Plovdiv Game Jam in 2020 ‚Äì and won the Audience Award right away. This experience inspired us to move from retail to publishing. Just a year later, we released our first game, Nasty Neighbors, which became a hit in Bulgaria and laid the foundation for NASTOLA Games.

Today, our goal is to bring our games to players worldwide ‚Äì games that focus on interaction, fun, and shared experiences.

exhibitors.INFO:
Octo Push

Welcome to Octo Push, a young and enthusiastic board game company founded by two friends with a shared passion for fantastic games and unforgettable adventures. Together, we are determined to bring a world of magical fantasy to life, where every player can experience their own epic story. Although we are still at the beginning of our journey, we are committed to making our first board game a great success.

Our talented Graphic Artist, Niels, makes Octo Push‚Äôs games shine with his unique and vibrant cartoon style. With years of experience in graphic design and unparalleled creativity, Niels transforms every drawing into a colorful and dynamic world. His playful illustrations and sleek designs ensure that each game is not only fun to play but also a visual masterpiece.

On the other hand, we have Jordy, our game designer. With thousands of games under his belt and years of experience in the board game industry, Jordy is the architect of unforgettable gaming experiences. His deep knowledge of strategic card games, deckbuilders, and RPGs allows him to create the most engaging interactions and innovative concepts. Every game he designs is a new adventure full of strategy and fun.

At Octo Push, we focus on creating enchanting fantasy games that take you to a world full of adventure and mystery. Our first board game, Artifox, is almost ready for publication, and we are incredibly proud of what we have achieved. We strongly believe in the power of our vision and the creativity of our team. With Niels‚Äô stunning artwork and Jordy‚Äôs innovative game designs, we are determined to offer a unique and immersive gaming experience!
exhibitors.NAME: Octo Push

News: PLUxINUS, the Gold Edition of the addictive dice and math game, was voted into third place by visitors of the Leipzig Hobby Fair 2025 in the player award!

PLUxINUS is both the name of the publisher and the game and brand name for the colorful dice and math games.

Fancy some dice, puzzles, and excitement right up to the last throw? Then play PLUS times MINUS = PLUxINUS! All you need are the 30 dice in the handy dice bag, which also fits perfectly in your bag when you're on the go.

Basic, as well as mental math can easily be fun for all generations: try to roll two-digit numbers and calculate them with the numbers rolled using addition, multiplication, or subtraction to collect as many points as possible. The player with the most points at the end of the game wins.

There are 3 game variants to choose from: In PLUxINUS for 2-8 players, everyone helps and anyone can win; in SOLO PLUxINUS, you are alone to get a new the high score; and SPEED PLUxINUS is the competitive variant for 2-8 professionals who don't need to think twice.

PLUxINUS dice games have been sold by the author, Alexander Reul, since 2023 via his own web shop, pluxinus.com. National and international distribution partners are welcome!

exhibitors.INFO:
Unternehmensprofil: Parameter B

√úber uns: Willkommen bei Parameter B. Wir sind ein leidenschaftlicher Krimi-Dinner Spieleverlag mit Sitz in Bornheim im Rheinland. Unsere Mission ist es, euch mit unseren Krimi-Dinner Spielen eine unvergessliche Zeit zu bieten. Lasst euch aus dem Alltag entf√ºhren und taucht gemeinsam in einen spannenden Kriminalfall ein. Euch erwarten Spa√ü, Spannung und jede Menge Detektivarbeit.

Unsere Produkte: Unsere Spiele kombinieren geschickt Krimidinner und Ermittlungsspiel zu einem einzigartigen Erlebnis. Ihr ermittelt in einem Mordfall oder einem Verbrechen, bei dem ihr selbst die Hauptverd√§chtigen seid. Jedes unserer sorgf√§ltig gestalteten Spiele √ºberzeugt durch Liebe zum Detail, faszinierende Themen, mitrei√üende Handlungen und facettenreiche Charaktere. Besonders gro√üen Wert legen wir auf Logik, L√∂sbarkeit und kreative R√§tselgestaltung in unseren Spielen.

Warum Parameter B:

  • Vielf√§ltige Themen: Wir bieten ein breites Spektrum an Themen, die ungew√∂hnlich, anspruchsvoll und fesselnd sind. Seid Patienten einer Psychiatrie oder nehmt Teil an einem Experiment im Schlaflabor.

  • Logik und L√∂sbarkeit: Unsere Spiele werden von Mathematikern entwickelt und mehrfach getestet, f√ºr garantiert logische und wissenschaftlich korrekte F√§lle.

  • Lokal produziert: Wir sind stolz darauf, unsere Spiele lokal in Bornheim zu produzieren, um h√∂chste Qualit√§t und Individualit√§t zu gew√§hrleisten.

  • Verschiedene Schwierigkeitsgrade: Unsere Spiele bieten eine Bandbreite an Schwierigkeitsgraden, die sowohl Neulinge als auch Wiederholungst√§ter begeistern.

  • Neu im Programm: Ganz neu im Programm ist unser dritter Familienfall f√ºr Kinder ab 12 Jahren.

Besucht uns auf der Messe! Wir freuen uns auf euch!

exhibitors.INFO:
Peacock Tabletops consists only of one person: me, Florian Pfab. I live in the picturesque medieval town of Regensburg in Bavaria and currently work as a teacher of fine arts and the German language. In addition to my studies as a teacher, I have also completed a degree in fine arts and a postgraduate doctorate.

In the year 2018, as a passionate board player, I had the idea to design and produce a game myself. This game finally developed into Materia Prima.

Behind Peacock Tabletops is the philosophy that the design and mechanisms of a game should be as one. Everything superfluous is eliminated, so that in the end only the essence of a game idea remains. For this reason I design the game mechanisms parallel to the design of the individual game components in order to guarantee an optimal game experience at the end.

By the way, thanks to my studies of fine arts I am able to design all game components with pencil, brush and paint. It's all handmade that way.
exhibitors.NAME: Peacock Tabletops

The family-owned company's range includes games for every generation and puzzles, most of which are produced at its Vienna site and sold in over 70 countries around the world. In 2020, the publisher received the coveted ‚ÄòKinderspiel des Jahres‚Äô critics' award for the children's game ‚ÄòSpeedy Roll‚Äô . We are bookworms. Movie maniacs. RPG players. Story addicts‚Ä¶

Books and movies are an amazing escape that can take us to different worlds. They fuel our imagination and dreams. They let us walk in the shoes of great heroes and have exciting adventures. With games, however, we can go further. We can experience these stories together with our friends. Gather around a table and fight enemies together. Survive or die as a group. Together, we can tell stories.

This is what we do. This is what we believe in. Do you want to defend a castle? Do you want to build an Empire? Survive on deserted Island? Call your friends, sit at the table and get ready for the amazing story you will tell this evening.

Founded in 2013 by a History teacher, PYTHAGORAS is a Portuguese publisher specializing in board games and educational content with historical and cultural themes. Our games provide entertaining, high-quality moments of learning and creativity with family or friends. They combine engaging challenges with easy-to-understand rules. Featuring captivating, collectible illustrations, each game is carefully printed and produced with safety in mind.

To promote and share our games, we regularly host events and activities at schools, associations, and other organizations. Whether played in a classroom setting or during relaxed family gatherings, our games offer a solid, engaging foundation and are designed to be played in under 60 minutes.

We also help bring new ideas to life! If you have a game concept, share it with us ‚Äî we have the experience to transform it into a compelling educational tool, reaching both classrooms and households.

Let‚Äôs work together to create even more meaningful and enjoyable learning moments.

Queensell Inc. was founded in 2021 in the USA by a group of Ukrainians passionate about classic board games. The company specializes in offering a curated selection of timeless favorites, including dominoes, chess, and backgammon.

In 2025, Queensell expands its original game lineup with Meteor Shower, a fast and strategic 2-player tabletop game. Meteor Shower brings a fresh, dynamic experience to players.

Dedicated to igniting joy and intellectual stimulation, Queensell Inc. aims to be a global force in the board game industry. Their commitment to uniting people of all ages worldwide and fostering lifelong learning through play is evident in every meticulously crafted game.

Queensell offers board games ‚Äî but adds something more: emotion, rituals, stories, and a sense of belonging.

Inside every Queensell game, there‚Äôs more than just pieces and rules ‚Äî there‚Äôs a reason to gather, share stories, and stay close.

exhibitors.INFO:
The Shroud was our last promise.

A veil of Essence, woven by sacrifice, stretched across the skies to hold the darkness at bay. But promises fade. Now, the Shroud ‚Äì and with it, the world ‚Äì fractures.

The mighty Silver Line clings to order with iron resolve, while the Umbral Veil festers in the shadows, sowing dissent. From the depths of the wild, nature's wrath rises in the form of the Bloodthorne, while the Chosen of the Spirit Tree stand as the last whisper of harmony. And deeper still, other powers stir. Old powers.

Forgotten ones...

Shroudfall is a skirmish wargame of tactical depth and unfolding story, where warbands clash in desperate battles for Essence, survival, and control. Customize your army, shape the battlefield, command unique Essence Weavers, and shift the tide of conflict in a world unraveling at the seams.

More information: https://www.shroudfall.com/

exhibitors.INFO:
Driving Me Crazy! (2025) from Simplexity Games

Driving Me Crazy! is a simple but strategic card game where players race to reach their holiday destination, all while sabotaging each other along the way. There are only about 4 rules, but the card combinations are endless, so it is great fun for beginners as well as more experienced players.

This deluxe edition includes the base game for 2 - 6 players, an expansion for up to 10 players, and four unique game variants that add variety and replayability. It all comes in a custom-designed car-shaped magnetic box, complete with a working trunk.

Easy to learn, quick to play. Perfect for fans of player interaction and humour!

Timebox - Speed Up Your Games

Make your games actually finish within the time it says on the box! With Timebox, a customizable board game timer, you can add time control to any board game. It works whether you play heavy eurogames, party games, wargames or anything else. Timebox supports any player count and you intuitively keep track of player turns and game phases by physically moving the timer around the table. Designed by board gamers, Timebox replaces traditional sand- and egg timers with an interface optimized for board games. Visit www.timebox.huzi.dev to find out more. By Huzi Development.

Come playtest Bomb‚Äôs Away! (expected: 2027) featuring Timebox as a core component!

Muster: Raise the Banners (2025) from Play Monkey Games

Step into the enchanting realms of Muster, where players compete to Raise the Banners and seize control of five majestic castles.

Strategic planning and bold tactics will determine who emerges victorious in this fast-paced, two-player duel!

2 Players  ‚óè  20 minutes  ‚óè  Ages 8+  ‚óè  Area Control ‚óè  Hand Management ‚óè  Layering 

InterAction Education - TeamBuilders (2024)

This freelance brand by Simplexity‚Äôs founder, Dixon, is a corporate training and consultancy brand.

TeamBuilders is an educational game and tool for teams to enjoy while learning about 4 team development models and how team members can interact with one another in different combinations of traits. Is this the next activity or training for you and your team? Chat with Dixon about it and/or take home a copy!
exhibitors.NAME: Simplexity Games

Advantages for Small Publishers

Spiel direkt eG ‚Äì your direct access to retail!

Dear publishers,
do you agree that it is getting ever more difficult to place you product in retail stores? Do you agree, that hardly anybody has an overview over the game market? Do you have an idea which retail shops your games could fit in, if only you could get into contact with the owners?

Spiel direkt is set up as a community of game publishers willing to sell their products directly to retailers. Our co-operative offers all our games on ONE website, some games are available here exclusively. We provide interesting offers and professional logistics.

A co-operation of small publishers.

Spiel direkt has been founded begin of 2012 as reaction to the procedure of the existing wholesalers, who have transformed from wholesaler to distribution partners of bigger publishers. Spiel direkt therefore is a new wholesaler, but with the distinctive feature that the publishers themselves are owners of this company.

Spiel direkt eG is the wholesaler for the little ones!

TOSSIT is an innovative throwing game that combines elements of darts and boccia - but reinvented in a whole new way. With specially designed silicone darts that stick to almost any smooth surface, you can play anytime, anywhere: in the living room, garden, office, or at the beach.

A highlight of the collection are our silicone night lamps: safe, sturdy, child-friendly, and designed to provide warm, calming light. exhibitors.INFO:
The Spiel Foundation is a international charity focused play as a positive and powerful force in the world. All of our many efforts are driven by this beautiful idea - the more we play together, the better and more compassionate the world can be.

We deliver tens of thousands of board games to organizations in need across the world (libraries, hospitals, senior homes, community centers, homeless shelters, domestic violence shelters, boys & girls clubs, schools, mental health facilities, and even prisons). We have delivered over 18,000 games in recent years and have another 20,000 games being readied for delivery.

We oversee two game award programs: Major Fun and The Spiel of Approval. Major Fun celebrates games great for kids, families and parties. The Spiel of Approval celebrates games that encourage thoughtful or strategic play.

Our media network includes The Spiel podcast, a show that has been in production for 19 years, covering the world of games and the people who love them. We also produce documentary films like Made for Play: Board Games & Modern Industry.

We rent booth space big game conventions so we can host game demo tables for a wide array of international publishers and designers who might not be able to afford their own exhibit space.

We will be opening our own facility, the DeKoven Center for Play in Indianapolis in 2026! It is a hub for all our activities. It will have greatly expanded storage space for our bundle program. It will also have a large game library and sommunity space for regular game sessions as well as events and seminars.

Everything we do, we try to make the world just a little more playful.

We hope you will come visit our booth, demo some games, donate a little money to play in our Spielathon, and (most importantly) HAVE FUN!
