exhibitors.INFO:
We create distinct and friendly games that can be explained in 60 seconds or less.

Our games captivate players through intuition, emotion, and analogue interactions.

Our aim is to foster shared laughter and meaningful connections.

The Vibe

In this collaborative game, players take turns as The Vibe, choosing a theme and giving clues by ordering pictures. The others try to guess what The Vibe is signaling.

The Vibe is a friendly and intuitive game that sparks meaningful conversations.

Contains 64 It's great for both kids and

postcard-size adults.

Our Secret Society 

Our Secret Society is a party game that could easily belong in a Monty Python sketch.

Players form a secret society and take turns playing cards to introduce new rules that everyone must follow. Each time a rule is introduced, the player must read it aloud while following both the new rule and all the previous ones.

As the game goes on, keeping up with the rules becomes increasingly challenging and convoluted, leading to an absurd performance each time anything is done.

The player who manages to follow the rules best becomes the head of the secret society.

exhibitors.INFO:
Wizards of Learning (WoL) ‚Äì Human-Centered Educational Game Studio from Thailand

At WoL, we turn real-world learning needs into games people love to play. Based in Bangkok, we specialize in designing educational board games for schools, NGOs, and public campaigns‚Äîgrounded in learning science, but built with engaging mechanics, replayability, and clear emotional arcs.

Over the past 8 years, we‚Äôve developed and produced over 35 games across topics like financial literacy, digital well-being, civic decision-making, and empathy building‚Äîwith support from ministries, foundations, and regional organizations.

Here are three standout titles we're showcasing:

  • Wishlist ‚Äì Version‚ÄØ2: A 2‚Äì6 player strategy game turning personal finance into an engaging challenge. Balance saving vs. spending with realistic scenarios‚Äîfixed deposits, life events, and fun mode variations for varying ages

  • Pizza Master: A light but strategic 2‚Äì5 player game where you, as a Pizza Apprentice, race to complete orders in a hectic kitchen‚Äîjuggling ingredients, timing, and unpredictable twists

  • Last Hand Standing: A quick 2‚Äì5 player math-survival game with a darkly fun theme: roll dice, use arithmetic to cut opponents‚Äô fingers‚Äîand be the last hand with at least one finger left

These games are more than playful‚Äîthey're tools for learning: teaching planning, collaboration, numeracy, and critical thinking‚Äîall wrapped in enjoyable mechanics.

This is our first time exhibiting at‚ÄØSpiel Essen, and we‚Äôre eager to connect with publishers, educators, designers, and enthusiasts. We‚Äôd love to hear your thoughts, explore partnerships, or just share a game session. We‚Äôre currently exploring:

  • International licensing & localization

  • Co-design partnerships with publishers

  • Expanding impact in educational & serious game markets

Let‚Äôs talk. We‚Äôd love to hear what you‚Äôre working on.
exhibitors.NAME: Wizards of Learning

exhibitors.INFO:
Our story

Zygomatic is a board game publishing studio belonging to Asmodee (a major player in the board games field around the world). The studio was created in 2016 to take care of and grow successful games like Dobble, Jungle Speed, Abalone (and many more!), but also to develop new games to be played with family and friends.

Our Mission

Our mission is above all things to enable you to play again and again, and share unique moments with your loved ones! To do this, we create simple and innovative board games, for adults as well as for kids!

Our team

We are a small, happy team, all united by our shared love of games, and all big believers in their importance: to laugh, create bonds, and grow. Therefore, we take great care of our projects and develop fun, quality games, which are easy to understand and quick to play, fun, and stimulating.
For this we work closely with authors, illustrators, and manufacturers, to test and improve the mechanics and ergonomics of our games, in order to make them fun and unforgettable.

exhibitors.INFO:
We are asmodee

A powerhouse of imagination and creativity where every game tells a story and every player becomes a part of an epic adventure.

Since our founding in France in 1995, we‚Äôve transformed the world of board games, card games, and role-playing games (RPGs), merging passion with artistry and bridging the gap between creation and player. We don‚Äôt just make board games; we create moments of connection that turn play into art, making extraordinary experiences easily accessible, across all retail channels, to game enthusiasts worldwide.

We are Bold

We create groundbreaking games that competitors cannot match. Our creations push the boundaries of imagination, play and expectations.

We are Creative

We don‚Äôt run away from risks, we embrace them. By constantly crafting new universes and launching revolutionary products, we keep players worldwide on their toes and wanting more.

We are Passionate

Our dedication stems from being players ourselves. To us, board games are more than just a way to pass the time ‚Äì they're a gateway to adventure and storytelling.

We are Welcoming

We believe everyone has an inner player in them. Our doors are open to everyone, regardless of age or background, to join our diverse and inclusive gaming community where every player is celebrated and every game is an experience to remember.

At our core we love games and want to share that passion. We collaborate with studios around the world, providing distribution support and access to our extensive network. With more than 20 local distribution businesses, we operate close to local markets to provide unparalleled range and service to our customers. We are proud of our long term partnerships that allow us to bring an ever-growing eclectic mix of incredible games to a widest possible audience. And aim to continue doing so for generations to come.

exhibitors.INFO:
Shogito is a modern board game inspired by the traditional Japanese game of shogi, which has been played for over 1,000 years.
While keeping its original rules, Shogito has been reimagined as an accessible and intuitive experience, even for players with no prior knowledge of shogi.

Developed through workshops with players aged 5 to 70+ in more than 16 countries, Shogito is designed to connect people across cultures, languages, and generations.
It encourages dialogue over competition, making it ideal for family play, educational settings, and cross-cultural events.

Shogito invites open, bias-free interaction through play.
We‚Äôre also looking forward to new collaborative opportunities‚Äîwith publishers, educators, and designers‚Äîwho share our passion for meaningful, cross-cultural experiences through games.

Whether you're a game enthusiast, a buyer, or a potential partner, Shogito offers a unique and engaging way to bring people together.

The sister magazine SPIEL DOCH! is aimed at all those who are interested in board and card games but are not (yet) game connoisseurs.
